## Scalable, flexible data collection. From any source, in any format.
Our platform creates a digital representation of your business, ensuring every data point mirrors your real-world operations. The intelligent benchmarking tools then automatically plug gaps in data availability, ready for ongoing analysis at any time.
## A single source of truth.
Consolidate your emissions data into one reliable, user-friendly platform. Your data now exists in a tailor-made system of record, mirroring the structure, activities, and carbon footprint of your business, enabling a single view of all emissions-related matters.
## Push-button reporting, always-on auditing.
Meet every reporting standard by default, generate reports with a single click, and enjoy peace of mind with continuous auditing. Minimum enables you to create audit-ready reports at the click of a button, tailored to every disclosure standard and customized format.
## Expert guidance, every step of the way.
Navigate the complexities of emissions data with guidance from our seasoned sustainability experts. Minimum's team of world-leading sustainability experts provide the white-glove, end-to-end service you can expect when implementing enterprise software.

**Company Summary: Minimum**

Minimum is a cutting-edge company founded in 2020, headquartered in London, United Kingdom. It emerged from Y Combinator's Summer 2020 batch, geared towards helping corporations and investment funds tackle the pressing challenge of climate change. Their mission? To help organizations achieve Net Zero by providing robust technology solutions tailored for carbon accounting and emissions management.

### What They Do
Minimum primarily focuses on helping businesses measure, report, and reduce their carbon emissions. Their platform enables users to accurately calculate their carbon footprints and enhances transparency in emissions data, making compliance with global regulations seamless and efficient. They offer functionalities around carbon accounting, supplier engagement, and managing financed emissions, ensuring a comprehensive approach to emissions tracking.

### Key Features
1. **Data Management**: Minimum's platform creates a digital representation of businesses, consolidating emissions data into a single source of truth. It facilitates push-button reporting and continuous auditing, which helps organizations meet disclosure standards effortlessly.
   
2. **Expert Guidance**: Companies benefit from the expertise of sustainability professionals who guide them through the complexities of emissions data, ensuring that every step towards Net Zero is well-supported.

3. **Flexible Integration**: Minimum is engineered to integrate seamlessly with existing corporate infrastructures. This adaptability allows businesses to leverage their current systems while enhancing their emissions management capabilities.

4. **Global Partnerships**: The company has formed significant partnerships, including a global collaboration with Nasdaq, to further elevate its impact in the corporate sustainability space.

### Market Focus
Minimum operates in the fintech and climate sectors, aiming to provide scalable solutions that can cater to a wide range of industries, including manufacturing, hospitality, retail, and utilities. Their innovative approach encourages organizations of all sizes to engage meaningfully with their carbon emissions and sustainability goals.

### Conclusion
With its progressive technology, expert-driven insights, and commitment to fostering transparency in corporate emissions data, Minimum stands out as a formidable player in the quest for a sustainable future. If you're in the market for reducing your carbon footprint and navigating the path to Net Zero, Minimum offers the tools and guidance you need to transform your sustainability strategy effectively.

For more information, visit [Minimum's website](https://minimum.com).
